text: Ronald "Chico" Maki (August 17, 1939 â€“ August 24, 2015) was a Canadian professional ice hockey right winger. He played a career total of 15 seasons in the National Hockey League (NHL). He played all of his NHL career with the Chicago Black Hawks. He won the Stanley Cup with the Chicago Black Hawks in 1961. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey forwards Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:People from Sault Ste.
